fact.description: Melany took the pills in her room in the morning.
Henry was in Body's study in the morning.
Doctor is a very good chemist.
Jessica was in Melany's room in the morning. She's the one, who could have swapped the pills.
Melany has some dangerous drugs with her.
Somebody swapped Body's medicines. Somebody gave him a drug that could have killed him.
Melany was in an erotic show with Jessica when young.

activities.activity: StartDialog(steve, Sir I have news about Mr Boddy)

xgml.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <Dialog xmlns="http://i-free.com/xml/xgml"> <MultiToken name="nDoctor">(doctor|Eddy|mr. Manhater|mister Manhater|Manhater|House)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nBody">(professor|Sheylock|mr. Body|mister Body|old fool|pervert|master|Body)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nMelany">(Melany|Melany Morgan|ms. Morgan|miss Morgan|Melly)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nHenry">(Henry|Moneyghan|mr Moneyghan|Henry Moneyghan|mister Moneyghan)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nButler">(Butler|Philip Morgan|Morgan|Philip)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nJess">(Jessica|mrs White|miss White|Jess|Jessica White)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nLinda">(Linda|mrs Moneyghan|Linda Moneyghan|missis Moneyghan)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nDrug">(drug|drugs|medicine|pill|pills|sedative)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nWeather">(weather)</MultiToken>
<MultiToken name="pU">(you|yours|thou|thee|U)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nFood">(milk|honey|bread|meat|cola)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="pYour">(your|yor|yo)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="vCan">(can | could | will | would| may)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qWhatBe">(tell (me|) (about|)|I am interested in|what (is|are|were|was|*ould be|)|know what) </MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qWhatBe0">(#(qWhatBe)|)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qWhoBe">(tell (me|) (about|)|I am interested in|who (is|are|was|were|*ould be|)|know who) </MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qWhoBe0">(#(qWhoBe)|)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qWhereBe">(I am interested in|where (is|are|was|were|*ould be|)|know where) </MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qWhereBe0">(#(qWhereBe)|)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qWhatAbout">(tell (me|) (about|)|I am interested in|(what|who|where) (is|are|was|were|*ould be|)|know (what|who|where) |(want|like|) to know * about|do #(pU) know about| have #(pU) * heard about|what * (#(pU)|#(pYour)) * (think|thought*|opinion)) </MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qWhatAbout0">(#(qWhatAbout)|)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qDoYouHave">(((do|if|whether) #(pU) (have|own|possess) | have #(pU) ))</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qWhy">(why|how come|(for|due to|) wh*|wh* reason*|wh* purpose*)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qWhy0">(#(qWhy)|)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="mother">(mother | mothers | mother's | mom | mom's | moms| mum | mum's | mums)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="brother">(brother | brother* | broz | bro | broz's)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="father">(father* |dad |dad's | daddy | daddys | daddy's)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="friend">(friend*|buddy|buddies)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="aSilly">(silly | sily | stupid | fool* | idiot* | moron*)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nNonsense">(nonsense | rubbish | drivel | garbage | twaddle | trash | babble | puffery | flummery | fool) </MultiToken> <MultiToken name="aStupid">(stupid | fool* | silly | (tiny | narrow | small | poor | ill) (brain* | mind*) | narrow-minded | idiot* | cretin* | dummy | dolt| freak) </MultiToken> <MultiToken name="aSmart">(smart | clever | intelligent | cute| wise|bright)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="aGood">(good | nice | fine | cool | beautiful | wonderful | well | OK | okay | okey | all right | very well | al*right* | not bad | great | not so bad | terrific | splendid | ex*el*ent|blooming|blossoming) </MultiToken> <MultiToken name="aBad">(bad|crappy|rotten|wretched|shitty|like crap|like shit)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nBadWord">(pig | bastard | suck | idiot | fuck* | motherf* | mother-fuck* | shit | ass | ass-* | asshole | asswipe | gay | homos* | fag | crap*|prostitute|arschloch|arsch|bitch) </MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qAreYou">(are #(pU) | (if | whether) | #(pU) are)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="ILiveIn">( my native country is |my native city is | i (live in | am living in | reside in | am from | come from ) )</MultiToken>
<MultiToken name="nHello">(((hi|hello|hallo|salute|bonjour|salut) (there|))|hey there | heil to thee |good (morning|day|afternoon|evening)|g'day |g day| howdy|olleh|halo) </MultiToken> <MultiToken name="Yes">(yes|yep|ye|y|OK|yeah|yeh|i do|)</MultiToken>
<!-- igolubev --> <MultiToken name="ComeOn">(#(Yes)|let us|let's|come on)</MultiToken>
<MultiToken name="No">(no|non|none|n|never|not|nope|nop|i don't|i do not)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nation"> (american|russian|chinese|british|english|french|spanish|dutch|italian|greek|german|belgian|ukrainian|jew|jewish|canadian|austrian|japanese|polish|polack|bulgarian|hungarian|mexican|brazilian) </MultiToken> <MultiToken name="Day">(today|now|yesterday|tomorrow|after tomorrow|next week|* birthday)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="Weather"> (rain*|snow*|blizzard|frost*|wind*|storm*|breeze|cyclone|fog*|smog*|haze|sunny|sunshine|sun * bright|cloudy|cold|hot|weather) </MultiToken> <MultiToken name="aColor">(red|blue|pink|yellow|black|white|teal|magenta|green|violet|orange)</MultiToken>
<!-- igolubev --> <MultiToken name="YouAreWelcome"> ((you are|you're|#(pU)|#(pYour)) welcome|please [feel] [free] [to]|(not|do not|don't) (for that|at all|mention it)|[(is|have)] nothing to|no reason to|forget it) </MultiToken>
<MultiToken name="aAbout">(about|on|of)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="aAlways2">(always)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qDoYouLike">((do|Are|if) (not|) you * (not|) (like|fond|keen|fan))</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="Edelweiss">(your (home|native|) * planet|planet * you * from|place * you * from|Edelweiss|planet * spoonies)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="jBored">(bored|tired|sick and tired|apathetic)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="jBad1">(bad|not good|crappy|shitty|inferior|awful)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="jBig1">(big|large|great|giant|huge|enormous|colossal|defective|terrible)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="jFast1">(fast|speedy|agile|blistering|light*speed|quick)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="jOptimum2">(optimum|optimal|best)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="jPerfect1">(perfect|ideal|unflawed|faultless|errorless)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="jSad">(sad|unhappy|depressed|sorrowful|downhearted|miserable|joyless|melanchol*|saddened)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="northpole">((the|) North Pole|(place|country|location|where) you ((are|come|came|) from|used to (live|dwell)|lived before)) </MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nproblem1">(problem*|issue*|difficult*|trouble*)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qWhoBeWho">(who (is|was|were))</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qDoYouKnow">((do|did|if|) (not) you * know)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qHaveYou">((have|do|are) (not|) you (have|having|got))</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="vThink">(think*|thought*|opinion*|suppose*|believ*|belief*)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="DoYouThink">((Do|if|#(qWhatAbout)) * (you|your) #(vThink))</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="vGive">(give*|giving|yield*supply*)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="vLike">(like*|love|lovi*)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="qDoYouThink">((Do|if|#(qWhatAbout)) * (you|your) #(vThink))</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="vUnderstand1">(understand*|comprehend*|grasp*)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="vWant">(want*|wish*|desire*|like*|lust*|need*|demand*)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="vWork">(work*|perform*|operate*|operating)</MultiToken> <MultiToken name="nMoney">(money|stock*|bond*|share*|account*|deposit*|GAAP|dividend*|payment*|fee*|bill*)</MultiToken>
</Dialog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <Dialog xmlns="http://i-free.com/xml/xgml">
<Import file="common_tokens.xgml"/>
<Theme name="Eddy_hears_Melany_fainted"> <QAUnit name="Eddy_hears_Melany"> <Pattern>* help * melany *</Pattern> <Pattern>* melany * faint* *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>A patient! Hooray! I hope, she doesn't die till I come. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
</Theme>
<Theme name="Eddy_looks_for_patient"> <QAUnit name="Eddy_looks_for_patient"> <Pattern>*</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Detective, we can talk later, when the patient dies. Now I'd better do my duty with the doctoring.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Eddy_HelpMelany"> <QAUnit name="Eddy_Melany_help"> <Pattern>* #(nMelany) * (faint*|sick*|unwell|help) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* help * #(nMelany) *</Pattern> <Pattern>*</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Oh, what a nice surprise. What do we have here.. another Body? No, this one's still breathing and I don't believe they have been secretly married. Hello darling.. Whoa, the whiskey smell.. But I think she took something else as well. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>+10</NerveChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Eddy_Melany_recovered"> <QAUnit name="Eddy_Melany_recovered"> <Pattern>*</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Stupid girl, taking it with alcohol! Five more minutes and we'd have another body here, though on quite another stage of scientific career. I told you, it wasn't a sedative, it was a heart drug. If mixed with alcohol - comes to no good. Of course, the girl did not know. Did you give her the pills? </Text> </Random> <!--FACT4 - Melany took a heart drug, thinking it was a sedative named Paciense. Obviously, from the bottle that used to belong to Body.--> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_Fainted1</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_Fainted2</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_Fainted7</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Eddy_Melany_Fainted1"> <Pattern>* #(No) *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Just wonderful. Who has then? Where did she get it? And besides.. Something's wrong with the bottle.. Where's the first one? Can you give it to me? </Text> </Random> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_fanted4</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_fanted3</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Eddy_Melany_Fainted2"> <LinkedPattern>* #(Yes) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>You mean, you gave her the pills? You are an idiot then. But see.. This bottle is different a bit! Check your pockets, man and give me the first pills. Do you have them?</Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>+15</NerveChange> <AffinityChange>+20</AffinityChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_fanted4</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_fanted3</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Eddy_Melany_Fainted7"> <LinkedPattern>*</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Well, anyway. I see this bottle is a bit different - somebody tried to forge my signature and failed. Give me the medecine from the table, will you. </Text> </Random> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_fanted4</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_fanted3</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Eddy_Melany_Fainted3"> <LinkedPattern>* #(No) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>You mean, you've lost a clue? Oh, wonderful. Then go and find it.</Text> </Random> <!--FACT5 - Somebody swapped Body's medicines. Somebody gave him a drug that could have killed him--> <Effects> <NerveChange>+15</NerveChange> <AffinityChange>-10</AffinityChange> </Effects> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_fanted4</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_fanted3</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Eddy_Melany_Fainted4"> <Pattern>* (pill*|drug|medicine|bottle) from #(nBody)* * (study|room|table|desk) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* (here|this) * (pill*|drug|medicine|bottle) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(Yes) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Now, let me see.. Damn it! The medicine from Body's room looks the same.. But it's a stronger drug, not the one I gave him. We have two bottles pretending to be the Paciense sedative here. And none of them is Paciense. Do you know what it means? </Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>+15</NerveChange> <AffinityChange>+20</AffinityChange> </Effects> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_Fainted10</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_Fainted11</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Eddy_Melany_Fainted12</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits><!--FACT5 - Somebody swapped Body's medicines. Somebody gave him a drug that could have killed him--> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Eddy_Melany_Fainted11"> <LinkedPattern>* #(Yes) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Of course! The second medicine could cause a heart attack. And the attack could cause him fall down and have the damned chandelier fall with him. A coincidence after all. Somebody must have swapped the medicines. I'd ask the young lady about where she got her Mickey Finn.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>+20</NerveChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> <RevealedFacts> <Fact id="5">Somebody swapped Body's medicines. Somebody gave him a drug that could have killed him.</Fact> </RevealedFacts> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Eddy_Melany_Fainted10"> <LinkedPattern>* #(No) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>But that's easy! The second medicine could cause a heart attack. And the attack could cause him fall down and have the damned chandelier fall with him. A coincidence after all. Somebody must have swapped the medicines. I'd ask the young lady about where she got her Mickey Finn.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>+20</NerveChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> <RevealedFacts> <Fact id="5">Somebody swapped Body's medicines. Somebody gave him a drug that could have killed him.</Fact> </RevealedFacts> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Eddy_Melany_Fainted12"> <LinkedPattern>*</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Why, that's easy. The second medicine could cause a heart attack. And the attack could cause him fall down and have the damned chandelier fall with him. A coincidence after all. Somebody must have swapped the medicines. I'd ask the young lady about where she got her Mickey Finn.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>+20</NerveChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> <RevealedFacts> <Fact id="5">Somebody swapped Body's medicines. Somebody gave him a drug that could have killed him.</Fact> </RevealedFacts> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
</Dialog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <Dialog xmlns="http://i-free.com/xml/xgml">
<Theme name ="Henry_Melany_fainted" description="Генри видит лежащую Мелани"> <QAUnit name="Henry_Melany_Fainted"> <Pattern>*</Pattern> <Random> <Text>What, another one? Or is it some game you are playing? Nothing better to do than lie around.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Henry_seeks_doctor" description="Генри ищет врача"> <QAUnit name="Henry_seeks_doctor"> <Pattern>*</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Hey, Manhater. If I were a doctor I'd go and treat a patient. Because we suddenly seem to have one. She's there</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme> </Dialog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <Dialog xmlns="http://i-free.com/xml/xgml">
<Import file="common_tokens.xgml"/>
<Theme name="Melany_Faint"> <QAUnit name="Melany_Faint"> <Pattern>* #(nHenry) * your photo* *</Pattern> <Pattern>* photo* #(nHenry) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* photo* erotic *</Pattern> <Pattern>* erotic show *</Pattern>
<Random> <Text>Oh, no! Mister Farrett.. Mister Farrett.. Where did you.. How.. Ah!</Text> <!-- анимация --> </Random>
<Effects> <NerveChange>-100</NerveChange> <AffinityChange>+100</AffinityChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> <RevealedFacts> <Fact id="15">Melany has some dangerous drugs with her.</Fact> </RevealedFacts> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Melany_tellTheTruth"> <!--Мелани говорит правду. После обморока? Перед --> <QAUnit name="Melany_tells_truth"> <Pattern>*</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Detective! Listen to me! I was young and had no money to study. That was when I met Jessica. She was so charming, so knowing, so kind to me. She offered me to work in a show, twice a week. Shall I continue?</Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>-20</NerveChange> </Effects> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Melany_tells_truth2</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Melany_tells_truth2"> <LinkedPattern>* #(Yes) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>She seduced me and persuaded to work on stage. We looked so good together.. I loved her. Than I saw her with a man. Do you want me to go on?</Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>-20</NerveChange> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Melany_tells_truth3"> <LinkedPattern>* #(Yes) *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* do *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>I left the show, I ran away and nearly starved till I got a grant. But these pictures.. I thought it was all over and past is past. Now I'm ruined. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>-20</NerveChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> <RevealedFacts> <Fact id="8">Melany was in an erotic show with Jessica when young.</Fact> </RevealedFacts> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Melany_talks_pills" description="Мелани взяла таблетки в своей комнате"> <QAUnit name="Melany_talks_pills"> <Pattern>* where * (pill*|medicine|bottle*|drug*) *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Oh, that's Paciense, the sedative. I found it on the dressing table in my room, among the cosmetics. It must have been there since I left home. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>+10</NerveChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> <RevealedFacts> <Fact id="16">Melany took the pills in her room in the morning.</Fact> </RevealedFacts> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Melany_talks_room" description="Джессика ошивалась в комнате Мелани возле таблеток. Если Мелани до этого не пила с детективом виски с эротическими историями."> <QAUnit name="Melany_talks_room"> <Pattern>* *body * else * your room *</Pattern> <Pattern>* who * your room *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Well, I guess nobody was there - you see, my room is in the servant's quarters, so the maid doesn't come. Nobody else has the key.. Only.. Only.. Jessica came in. Oh... </Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>+30</NerveChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> <RevealedFacts> <Fact id="14">Jessica was in Melany's room in the morning. She's the one, who could have swapped the pills. </Fact> </RevealedFacts> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
</Dialog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <Dialog xmlns="http://i-free.com/xml/xgml">
<Import file="common_tokens.xgml"/>
<Theme name="First_greeting"> <QAUnit name="Filipp_greeting"> <Pattern>* knock * knock *</Pattern> <Pattern>* #(nHello) *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Good afternoon, sir. You'll be mr. Farrett, if I'm not mistaken. Please, wait a moment here, sir. I'll tell mr. Body. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Philipp_back"> <QAUnit name="Filipp_greeting2"> <Pattern>*</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Unfortunately, sir, mr. Body won't be able to see you today.</Text> </Random> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Filipp_greeting3</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit> <QAUnit name="Filipp_greeting3"> <LinkedPattern>*</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>However, considering the very limited likelihood that mr. Body will be able to see you later, sir, I suggest you go and see him. Before the coroner comes, sir. Please follow me, sir. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme> </Dialog>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?> <Dialog xmlns="http://i-free.com/xml/xgml">
<Import file="common_tokens.xgml"/>
<Theme name="Jess_politess"> <QAUnit name="Jess_Hello"> <Pattern>* #(nHello) *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Hello, detective. I'm really, really glad to see you.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jess_thank"> <Pattern>* (thank you|thanks|grateful) *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>My pleasure, mr. Farrett, my pleasure.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jess_bye"> <Pattern>* (bye-bye|see you|good night|have a nice|so long|take care) *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Come back soon, mr. Farrett.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jess_swearing"> <Pattern>* #(nBadWord) *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Does swearing turn you on, mr. Farrett? Do you experience some kind of problems without it?</Text> </Random> <Effects> <AffinityChange>-30</AffinityChange> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name = "Jess_weather"> <QAUnit name="Jess_weather"> <Pattern>* #(Weather) *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Detective, I hate talking about weather, I prefer talking about myself.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Jessica_lowAffinity" description="Джессика не доверяет детективу, требует комплиментов."> <!--<Conditions>--> <!--<Affinity>low</Affinity>--> <!--<Nerve>low,middle</Nerve>--> <!--</Conditions>--> <QAUnit name="JessLowAffinity_catchall"> <Pattern>*</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Detective, what are you at? I can not trust a man who doesn't pay compliments to a woman he's talking to. He might be either a blind man or a fool. </Text> </Random> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>JessLowAffinity_compliment1</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>JessLowAffinity_compliment2</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>JessLowAffinity_compliment3</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="JessLowAffinity_compliment1"> <LinkedPattern>* #(pU) * (pretty|beautiful|handsome|stunning|sexy|attractive|nice|gorgeous|wonderful) * </LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* i #(vLike) * #(pU) * (hair*|leg*|dress|eye*|makeup|face) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Write it in fire across the night: some men are more or less all right. That's what I say.</Text> <Text>Well thank you mr. Farrett. As Oscar Wilde said compliments are the only thing men can pay these days.</Text> <Text>Thank you, detective. I do hope we'll carry on with that.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <AffinityChange>+50</AffinityChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="JessLowAffinity_compliment2"> <LinkedPattern>* (#(nBadWord)|ass|tit*|arse|knocker*|buttock*) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>I see, you're used to a very specific kind of women, detective.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="JessLowAffinity_compliment3"> <LinkedPattern>*</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Hey, detective, what was that? I'm afraid this is too complicated a compliment for me, a poor village girl, huh. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
</Theme>
<Theme name="Jessica_normalAffinity_Catchall"> <!--Ответ на непонятные вопросы--> <QAUnit name="catchall"> <Pattern>*</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Your words make me blush under my makeup, detective.</Text> <Text>Let's change the topic to something more exciting.</Text> <Text>Is this another new strange way to flirt? Tell me more.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_cult"> <Pattern>* cult *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Body was studying it. Was the main part of his research.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Jessica_generalDiscussion_highNerve" description="Джессика нервничает"> <QAUnit name="catchall_nervous"> <Pattern>*</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Detective, there's nothing more I can tell you. But I've got something to show - if you only care to see. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>-10</NerveChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Jessica_flirt"> <!--Джессика внезапно набегает строить глазки пользователю --> <QAUnit name="Jessica_flirt"> <!--<Conditions>--> <!--<Affinity>middle, high</Affinity>--> <!--<Nerve>low,middle</Nerve>--> <!--</Conditions>--> <Pattern>*</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Tell me, detective.. How do you think, is it true that risky circumstances bring people closer.. I do truly believe it. </Text> <Text>Detective, can you come closer to me? I don't like to shout. And I just enjoy this feeling that you are standing so close to me. </Text> <Text>Mr. Farrett.. Do people often tell you how handsome you are? I guess they must..</Text> <Text>Detective, do you have a match to help me light my cigarette?</Text> <Text>Detective, this murder scares me so much.. I can't sleep at night, I'm afraid to stay alone in my room - the darkness starts to creep from the deep corners. </Text> <Text>Mr. Farrett.. I've got a HUUUUGE scary beaver in my room. Would you please check?</Text> <Text>Mr. Farrett, I see you have such a big cigar, have you got a smoke for me? I need a smoke when I'm nervous. </Text> <Text>Care for speleology tonight? Got a pretty deserted cave.</Text> <Text>Mr. Farrett, what would you say to a man if you were a woman and wanted to seduce him?</Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>-20</NerveChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_flirt2</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
</Theme>
<Theme name="Jessica_morning_trusting" description="Утро Джессики, доверительная версия"> <!--<Conditions> <Affinity>high</Affinity> <Nervosity>low, middle</Nervosity> </Conditions> --> <QAUnit name="Jessica_what_doing_trust"> <Pattern>* (#(qWhatAbout)|describe|where) * you * (morning|murder)* *</Pattern> <Pattern>* (#(qWhatAbout)|describe) * (morning|day) *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>It was such a lovely morning detective. I went for a walk in the garden - to freshen my complexion, you see.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_morning_what_doing_alibi_trust</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_morning_what_doing_alibi_trust"> <LinkedPattern>* (alibi|alone) *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* somebody * you *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* somebody * confirm *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>I'm afraid, nobody saw me - if only through the window. You weren't spying on me detective, were you? Sometimes I wish you were.. You know, I took care to wear my most revealing peignoir. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_suspicious"> <Pattern>* (see|hear|notice) * (suspicious|unusual) *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Well, actually.. Just before you came I went to check on Melany.. She was so pale, poor child.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_somebody</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_somebody"> <LinkedPattern>* did you * see * (room|study) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Oh, and when I was coming back from the garden, I saw somebody near his room. I think it was Henry. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>+2</NerveChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> <RevealedFacts> <Fact id="10">Henry was in Body's study in the morning.</Fact> </RevealedFacts> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Jessica_morning" description="Утро Джессики">
<QAUnit name="Jessica_what_doing"> <Pattern>* (#(qWhatAbout)|describe|where) * you * (morning|murder)* *</Pattern> <Pattern>* (#(qWhatAbout)|describe) * (morning|day) *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>I was in the garden most of the time.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_morning_what_doing_alibi</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_morning_what_doing_alibi"> <LinkedPattern>* (alibi|alone) *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* somebody * you *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* somebody * confirm *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>I'm afraid, nobody saw me - if only through the window. You know, I took care to wear my most revealing peignoir. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>

<Effects> <NerveChange>+2</NerveChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Jessica_others_lowAffinity" description="Джессика не доверяет детективу, хочет говорить только о себе">
<QAUnit name="Jessica_others_low_aff">
<Pattern>* (#(qWhatAbout)|describe|inform) * (part*|guest*|people|others|everybody) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* who * (else|other|guest*) * (house|mansion|present) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* how long * know #(nMelany) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* you * relat* #(nMelany) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* (tell|who) * #(nMelany) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* how long * know #(nGenry) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* you * relat* #(nGenry) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* (tell|who) * #(nGenry) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* how long * know #(nDoctor) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* you * relat* #(nDoctor) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* (tell|who) * #(nDoctor) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* how long * know #(nButler) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* you * relat* #(nButler) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* (tell|who) * #(nButler) *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Detective, talking to a beautiful woman about others is a sign of bad upbringing.. you naughty boy. </Text> <Text>Don't make me think that you really are interested in all these people more than in me. Mr. Farrett. </Text> <Text>Is it really who you are interested in? Not me?</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_others_low_aff2</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_others_low_aff3</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_others_low_aff2"> <LinkedPattern>*</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>If you want me to help you, you'd better say something nice to me - about myself.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>+3</NerveChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_others_low_aff3</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_others_low_aff3"> <LinkedPattern>* #(pU) * (pretty|beautiful|handsome|stunning|sexy|attractive|nice|gorgeous) * </LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* i #(vLike) * #(pU) * (hair*|leg*|dress|eye*|makeup|face) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Thank you, detective, that's much, much better. Now I do feel that you respect and admire me. And, of course, you know how much I admire you. Did I tell you you have a gorgeous chin? </Text> <Text>Thank you, detective. Now, I think I can talk to you about others.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <AffinityChange>+50</AffinityChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Jessica_others_highAffinity" description="Джессика доверяет детективу, рассказывает про других">
<QAUnit name="Jessica_others_general"> <Pattern>* (#(qWhatAbout)|describe|inform) * (part*|guest*|people|others|everybody) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* who * (else|other|guest*) * (house|mansion|present) *</Pattern>
<Random> <Text>Well, the others. Here comes Mr. Moneyghan - mr. Body's half brother, sugar daddy from the Wall Street. Melany Morgan is his research assistant - quite a career for a butler's daughter. Mr. Manhater is closest to what you can call a friend, and his doctor as well. And of course there is the butler. Filipp Morgan. </Text> </Random> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_Melany</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_Henry</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_Filipp</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_Eddy</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_relations_Body_Melany</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_relations_Body_Filipp</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_relations_Body_Henry</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_relations_Melany_Henry</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_relations_Melany_Eddy</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_relations_Melany_Filipp</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_relations_Henry_Eddy</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_relations_Henry_Butler</LinkedUnit> <LinkedUnit>Jessica_relations_Filipp_Eddy</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits>
</QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_Melany"> <Pattern>* how long * know #(nMelany) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* you * relat* #(nMelany) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* (tell|who) * #(nMelany) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nMelany) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Melany, the daughter of the butler and mr. Body's research assistant. It was mr. Body's sister who wanted to give the girl an education. Melany proved to be smart, got to university and even managed to acquire an get grant. Then Body recommended her to a friend of his who works in France - and was quite surprised to see how pretty she had become after 2 years in Paris when she came back recently. She's such an academic birdie - is willing to talk mostly about her thesis and studies, no nonsense with her. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_Henry"> <Pattern>* how long * know #(nGenry) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* you * relat* #(nGenry) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* (tell|who) * #(nGenry) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nGenry) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Mr Body's half-brother. From a second wife of old mr. Body. She married him for money and ran away as soon, as she understood that she wasn't getting any, leaving the child behind. The father didn't even want him have his name. So Henry did all he could to earn money - and succeeded. Money and power are the only things he's interested in, and he despises everyone who thinks otherwise. You want to get Henry Moneyghan - you flatter him, or you talk money to him. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_Eddy"> <Pattern>* how long * know #(nDoctor) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* you * relat* #(nDoctor) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* (tell|who) * #(nDoctor) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nDoctor) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>The Doctor. Nobody knows much about him. He's thought to be Body's only friend, but neither of them is known to have friends. He's a good chemist. There had been rumours that he was helpful to many people who wanted to die.. Or their relatives wanted them to. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>+2</NerveChange> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> <RevealedFacts> <Fact id="13">Doctor is a very good chemist.</Fact> </RevealedFacts> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_Filipp"> <Pattern>* how long * know #(nButler) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* you * relat* #(nButler) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* (tell|who) * #(nButler) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nButler) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Oh, the Butler. Body's family come from England, so they brought the butler with them. And chose a place with an awful climate. And the food is rather old-world, I'm sorry to say. If you want him to trust you - pretend you are religious, and he's yours. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <NerveChange>+2</NerveChange> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_relations_Body_Melany"> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nBody) * #(nMelany) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* #(nBody) * (affair|sleep|sex|fuck) * #(nMelany) * </Pattern> <Pattern>* #(nBody) * * #(nMelany) * (affair|sleep|sex|fuck|lover*) * </Pattern> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nMelany) * #(nBody) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nBody) * #(nMelany) *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nMelany) * #(nBody) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Oh, it's really an old story. She grew in the mansion - he didn't notice her. Than she was just her research assistant - all so good and plain. Then she goes to Paris - et voila! Cinderella on the ball and all that stuff. Only the midnight is coming, the pumpkin isn't a real cart. </Text>
</Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_relations_Body_Eddy"> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nBody) *(nDoctor) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nDoctor) * #(nBody) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nDoctor) * #(nBody) *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nBody) *(nDoctor) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>They had somewhat a weird relationship. Two men, each hating everybody else - and not liked much in return by the general world. They didn't display much affection to each other. It seems they were always playing chess. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_relations_Body_Filipp"> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nBody) *(nButler) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nButler) * #(nBody) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nButler) * #(nBody) *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nBody) *(nButler) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Philipp Morgan is just the perfect type of a perfect butler. The one, who comes silently from behind. The one, who is everywhere and knows everything. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_relations_Melany_Henry"> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nMelany) *(nGenry) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nGenry) * #(nMelany) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nButler) * #(nBody) *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nGenry) * #(nMelany) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Mr. Moneyghan pretends to despise Melany, as she's the butler's daughter. But really he envies her - she got what he couldn't get when a child. He thinks her a </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_relations_Melany_Eddy"> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nMelany) * #(nDoctor) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nDoctor) * #(nMelany) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nDoctor) * #(nMelany) *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nMelany) * #(nDoctor) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>They hardly know each other. Of course the old spider always watches everybody, but I don't think Melly interested him much. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_relations_Melany_Filipp"> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nMelany) * #(nButler) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nButler) * #(nMelany) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nMelany) * #(nButler) *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nButler) * #(nMelany) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Well, the old man is really crazy about his little angel of a daughter. But he'd rather see her well settled with a good hubby and six crying children than hopping through Paris. And the girl.. Well, she isn't too keen on mentioning in society that her father is a butler. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_relations_Henry_Eddy"> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nGenry) * #(nDoctor) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nDoctor) * #(nGenry) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nDoctor) * #(nGenry) *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nGenry) * #(nDoctor) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>No love lost between these two, I dare say. Moneyghan loves money and power, Manhater chemistry and chess. The only thing they share is general attitude to mankind. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_relations_Henry_Butler"> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nGenry) * #(nButler) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nButler) * #(nGenry) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nGenry) * #(nButler) *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nButler) * #(nGenry) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>Well. Filipp saw Henry grow - I guess, he's the one who really cared about him. However it's quite beyond mr. Moneyghan to pay attention to servants. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_relations_Filipp_Eddy"> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nButler) * #(nDoctor) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nDoctor) * #(nButler) *</Pattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nButler) * #(nDoctor) *</LinkedPattern> <LinkedPattern>* #(nDoctor) * #(nButler) *</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>I guess old Filipp is somewhat impressed by Manhater's austere sobriety, Cthulhu bless him, but is suspicious about his failing to be a good Christian. And Manhater is just polite with him. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
</Theme>
<Theme name ="Jessica_interrogation"> <QAUnit name="Jessica_who_was_it"> <Pattern>* who * (murder*|kill*|) * #(nBody) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* who * is * (guilty|murderer|culprit) *</Pattern> <Pattern>* who want #(nBody) dead *</Pattern> <Pattern>* who * you * susp* *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Oh, mr. Farrett, how could I tell? Considering the size of the chandelier, the person must be strong, perhaps, a man.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_who_profits"> <Pattern>* who * (profit*|inherit*|get) * (murder|death|crime|assassination) * </Pattern> <Pattern>* who * heir *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Well, nobody knows if mr. Boddy has made a will. His attorney isn't coming from the town till Monday. If there's no will, his nephew, Adam, will inherit. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_enemies"> <Pattern>* #(nBody) * enem* *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Talking about enemies.. Mr. Boddy had his relatives and colleagues, you see. His brother, Moneyghan, wasn't happy about the way their father had about the inheritance. His assistant, Melany Morgan, saw him most of all like a step to her career. The Manhater man kind of deserves his name.</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
</Theme>
<Theme name = "Jessica_about_herself"> <QAUnit name="Jessica_who_are_you"> <Pattern>* who are you *</Pattern> <Pattern>* tell * about yourself *</Pattern> <Pattern>* what is your name *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Nice to meet you again, mr. Farrett. My name is Jessica White and I'm a journalist in the local branch of the Times. I've been staying here for nearly three months already. My current assignment was to write mr. Boddy's biography. I'll be happy to help you with the investigation. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Jessica_cult_cult"> <!--Джессика о культе -->
<QAUnit name="Jessica_cult_first"> <Pattern>* cult *</Pattern>
<Random> <Text>Boddy was studying it. Was the main part of his research. The Cult is the main religion that existed here before white missionaries came in. The Indians worshipped Cthulhu - a great Octopus sleeping in the ocean. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> <LinkedUnits> <LinkedUnit>Jess_cult_1</LinkedUnit> </LinkedUnits> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jess_cult_1"> <LinkedPattern>*</LinkedPattern> <Random> <Text>This is quite an ancient things - the Cult is said to deal with black magic, and human sacrifices. The Cult was supposed to extinguish long before Europeans came here.. however it is said to have though a small but a number of adepts through last 5 centuries. The monuments are much, much older. But you see, some people even claim that there's a conspiracy of worshippers even now.. Crazy as it might sound. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
<QAUnit name="Jessica_cult_discovery"> <Pattern>* #(qWhatAbout) * #(nBody) * (discovery|finding|research) *</Pattern> <Random> <Text>I'm not quite sure. You see, he thought me quite unworthy to understand his big science. Was just talking a lot about the eternal glory and his citation index going up and up and up. </Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit>
</Theme>
<Theme name ="Jess_Melany_fainted" description="Джессика видит лежащую Мелани"> <QAUnit name="Jess_Melany_Fainted"> <Pattern>*</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Oh, poor Melly! What's happened to her? Doctor, doctor!</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
<Theme name="Jess_seeks_doctor" description="Джессика ищет врача"> <QAUnit name="Jess_seeks_doctor"> <Pattern>*</Pattern> <Random> <Text>Doctor, doctor! Please help Melany, she's fainted, something's wrong!</Text> </Random> <Effects> <BeatGoalAchieved>true</BeatGoalAchieved> </Effects> </QAUnit> </Theme>
</Dialog>
